name: salvage (itch) (jpbash)
description:
salvage is a short puzzle platformer, in which you play as three aquatic creatures investigating the wreck of a mysterious craft.

collect parts of the sunken vessel by navigating a series of puzzles - then attempt to reconstruct it.

created in 3 days for MiniJam 91

controls

[WASD] or [Arrows] to move

[esc] to exit

credits

art, music & programming - jp

font - hackbot by typefactory

incidental sound fx from sfxr.me
